patch:
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index c3c79198..7254655f 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -177,7 +177,7 @@
     "react-dev-utils": "6.1.1",
     "react-docgen": "2.14.0",
     "react-hot-loader": "^4.13.0",
-    "react-router-dom": "4.3.1",
+    "react-router-dom": "6.22.3",
     "react-test-renderer": "^17.0.2",
     "resolve": "1.8.1",
     "rimraf": "2.6.2",
diff --git a/src/documentation/App.tsx b/src/documentation/App.tsx
index 38b9b0dd..cdbfb816 100644
--- a/src/documentation/App.tsx
+++ b/src/documentation/App.tsx
@@ -1,22 +1,19 @@
 import React from 'react'
 import { hot } from 'react-hot-loader'
-import { Redirect, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'
+import { Navigate, Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom'
 import DocumentationPages from './app/AppContainer'
 
 const App = () => (
-  <Switch>
+  <Routes>
     <Route
-      exact
       path="/"
-      render={() => <Redirect to="/GettingStarted/getting-started" />}
+      element={<Navigate replace to="/GettingStarted/getting-started" />}
     />
     <Route
-      exact
       path="/:location/:route/:view?"
-      // @ts-expect-error TS(2769) FIXME: No overload matches this call.
-      component={DocumentationPages}
+      element={<DocumentationPages />}
     />
-  </Switch>
+  </Routes>
 )
 
 export default hot(module)(App)
diff --git a/src/index.tsx b/src/index.tsx
index ee3f29c9..ea60e2c3 100644
--- a/src/index.tsx
+++ b/src/index.tsx
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ import { HashRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'
 import App from './documentation/App'
 
 ReactDOM.render(
-  <Router basename={process.env.PUBLIC_URL}>
+  <Router>
     <App />
   </Router>,
   document.getElementById('root'),
